entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:19 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 03:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
